name: Universefox Entertainment
tag_list: oveo, media, entertainment, production, video, music
overview:
Universefox Entertainment is the world’s leading digital label, music and video distribution service. Artist can sell their music on iTunes, AmazonMP3, Rhapsody, Spotify and more. Company specializing in international music distribution and artist promotion. Universefox Entertainment distributes video through iTunes Video, MTV, MTV2, VEVO, Youtube, MUZU.tv, Centric TV, MCM and major European and USA mobile retailers. Universefox Entertainment distribute music and podcasts to over 4000 radio stations.

Universefox Entertainment provides audio, video, production, and management services, for artists, managers, producers, and labels. The company discovers, develops, markets and distributes recorded music through a network of subsidiaries, joint ventures and licensees in 30 countries, representing 98% of the music market. Universefox Entertainment also sells and distributes music video and СD, DVD products, and licenses recordings, encouraging the legal distribution of music online and over cellular, cable and satellite networks. Universefox Entertainment has paid over 750,000 million dollars to independent artists as of Dec 2012. In 2012 Universefox Entertainment has 22 980 registered artists.
